feed.subtitle: trog
feed.generator: Generated from Org-mode source code using lazyblorg which is written in Python. Industrial-strength technology, baby.

div.p: **** While out on a run a few days ago, I saw a "FREE" sign and went to check it out. There was a man slowly putting out stuff from his father's house. I grabbed as many totebags as I could run with, and came back later with my car.

ul.li: A bunch of nice tote bags from Riverrun, etc
Bitter Blood, a true crime book about a Winston-Salem murder, filled with newspaper clippings with articles about the case and the book
Old hand cart with a bunch of old bungee cords

div.p: **** While out on a run a few days ago, I saw a "FREE" sign and went to check it out. There was a man slowly putting out stuff from his father's house. I grabbed as many totebags as I could run with, and came back later with my car.

ul.li: A bunch of nice tote bags from Riverrun, etc
Bitter Blood, a true crime book about a Winston-Salem murder, filled with newspaper clippings with articles about the case and the book
Old hand cart with a bunch of old bungee cords

content.div:
This is a test post
ACHTUNG!
Das machine is nicht fur gerfingerpoken und mittengrabben.
Ist easy schnappen der Sprinngwerk, blowenfusen und
poppencorken mit spitzensparken.
Ist nicht fur gewerken by das Dummkopfen. Das rubbernecken
sightseeren keepen hands in das Pockets.
Relaxen und watch das blinkenlights…
Careful!
This here machine isn't meant for no finger-pokin' or hand-grabbin'.
It's mighty easy to snap the innards and blow a fuse,
complete with sparks a-spittin' and corks a-poppin'.
It is not a tool for block-heads.
Rubber-neckin' sight-seers: keep yer hands in yer pockets.
Relax and watch the blinking lights…
